name: SEIU

sampleDescriptions: Passing language within Good Jobs, Good Airports and work on FAA reauthorization.
Lobbied to garner support and cosponsors on Good Jobs Good Airports Act, FAA Reauthorization, and FY 24 Transportation Appropriations bill.
